title: China City Break within Wuhan near Yangtze River with Indoor Pool
description: Immerse yourself in the sprawling capital of Central China’s Hubei province at the glamorous InterContinental Wuhan, an IHG Hotel. Located on Qingchuan Boulevard near the Orient Golf Club, this city escape is within close reach of the Wuhan International Expo Center and the Yangtze River. Make the most of three mouthwatering eateries - including Catonese, Hubei-style and Huaiyang cuisine at YUE Chinese Restaurant - a shimmering indoor pool and an onsite fitness centre.
offer_address: No.666 Qingchuan Boulevard, Hanyang District, Wuhan, 430052 Mainland China

title: Wuhan Urban Oasis with Lakeside Views
description: Overlooking soothing Xi Lake, voco Wuhan Xinhua, an IHG Hotel is a tranquil refuge in the heart of cosmopolitan Wuhan. Savour authentic Cantonese cuisine at Fu Man Lou restaurant, take an evening stroll around the nearby lakes and parks or savour a refreshing cocktail at the Daze Lobby Lounge. Embrace local culture with a captivating opera performance before retiring to your cosy and stylish room for a restful slumber after another day in this vibrant city.
location_description: voco Wuhan Xinhua, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 558 Jianshe Avenue, Jianghan District, Wuhan 430015, China

title: Five-Star Wuhan City Break with Lake Views
description: Surrounded by countless rivers and lakes and world-class shopping and entertainment districts, Crowne Plaza Wuhan Development Zone, an IHG Hotel, is one of the only five-star international hotels in the region. After days spent exploring the metropolis’s countless charms - including Guiyan Temple’s storied pavilions and halls - return to authentic Cantonese cuisine at Cai Feng Lou Chinese Restaurant or classic cocktails among the bookshelves at Breeze Lobby Bar.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Wuhan Development Zone, an IHG Hotel

title: China: Futuristic-Style Wuhan City Break in Optic Valley
description: Discover the future vision of one of China’s most exciting technological precincts at Crowne Plaza Wuhan Optics Valley, an IHG Hotel, effortlessly blending cutting-edge architectural design and lakeside views for a dazzling stay. After days exploring the nearby Botanical Gardens or Yellow Crane Tower, retreat to Cai Feng Lou for authentic Huaiyang plates or V Bar for authentic Chinese and British tea served in an unforgettable setting.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Wuhan Optics Valley, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Part of 2-3 Floor & 9-21 Floor Building B, Wuhan, 430073, Mainland China
